attributes.action: The standard of care of the NHS is like the equivalent of a holocaust, there needs to be vast changes made immediately especially in Nottingham.
attributes.additional_details: The government needs to take immediate action of the NHS in Nottingham because their standard of care is like the equivalent of a holocaust and its absolutely appalling. They do not treat people appropriately and also NHS staff need to be struck off because some of them are incompetent and abuse their positions.
